content.description: Crack open your lunchtime eggies, add some ketchup packets, munch down, and then you'll be ready to barely leave the deck for this slopey lowball. Start crossed on the lowest two slopers, throw a right heel and pull out of the dirt. The route slaps out a couple feet then up Â a couple more feet. Decent quality rock, its a shame its so short. Route may be easier if you are missing your left leg as the hardest part is not dabbin.
content.protection: A briefcase pad and a carpet square will do ya just fine, a sweatshirt half full of leaves would suffice

content.description: mid day - afternoon sun, pretty scenic, fun little slopey lowball with one ok problem on it.
